suscribete_para: Sign in to find concerts and performances.
mantente_conectado: Stay connected, follow other musicians. Promote your concerts and performances.
promociona_musica: Promote your music and get followers.
vocalistas: Vocalists, bass players, drummers, rehearsal rooms, teachers and instruments. Everything you need is here!
des_compra_venta: Instruments, accessories and more, maybe what you're looking for, another musician sells it here.
desc_actuaciones: There are plenty of places with live music that demand what you have.
desc_clases: ¿Are you looking for a teacher? Do you teach music, singing or instruments lessons?
si_eres_musico: If you are a musician, you'll be interested
que_es_musicien: MUSICIEN has been created with the purpose of bringing music to all corners of the world. If you are a musician, you will know the effort it takes to go far within this profession, for this reason, and thanks to MUSICIEN, you can open your way, make yourself heard, make yourself known and have everything you need at your fingertips.
envia_sugerencia: Feel free to send us any doubt or suggestion you may have
nunca_daremos: We will never reveal your email address.
comparte_tu: Share your passion, share your music
perfiles_desc: Create new profiles and get the most out of Musicien
crea_perfiles_desc: Create different kind of profiles like soloist, musician, group... and add more information about you.
activa_notifi_desc: Activate notifications and do not miss anything in Musicien
sube_foto_desc: Your followers want to know you, update your profile picture.
personaliza_pagina_desc: Personalize your profile page and upload a cover photo

selecciona_uno_ini: Haz click en nuevo perfil y selecciona una de las opciones que te proponemos. Más adelante podrás añadir nuevos perfiles desde Preferencias - Editar Perfil
text1_bienve: Antes de poder disfrutar todo el contenido que te ofrecemos, te pedimos unos datos para saber algo más de ti.
text2_bienve: Queremos insistir en que nunca compartiremos estos datos con nadie.
text3_bienve: Este proceso sólo lo deberás hacer una sola vez y podrás modificar estos datos cuando quieras.
